title: Greetings Multiple Choice Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of basic Spanish greetings and introductions

questions.question: What does 'hola' mean in English?
questions.explanation: 'Hola' is the most common Spanish greeting meaning 'hello'.

questions.question: Which greeting would you use at 10 AM?
questions.explanation: 'Buenos días' is used in the morning until around 12 PM.

questions.question: How do you ask someone's name informally?
questions.explanation: '¿Cómo te llamas?' is the informal way to ask someone's name.

questions.question: What do you say to express 'nice to meet you'?
questions.explanation: 'Mucho gusto' means 'nice to meet you' or 'pleased to meet you'.

questions.question: Which is the formal way to ask someone's name?
questions.explanation: '¿Cómo se llama usted?' is the formal way to ask someone's name.
